title: Religious diversity in Middle East/North Africa in 2010 , by religion
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories for the x axis representing Religion, and a y axis representing Percentage of population.
The highest category is found at Muslims where Percentage of population is 93.0.
The lowest category is found at Unaffiliated where Percentage of population is 1.0.
gold: This statistic shows religious diversity in Middle East and North Africa in 2010 , by share of religious population . In 2010 , about 93 percent of population in the Middle East and North Africa were Muslims .
